content: this is a super easy and quick pattern that makes a cute octopus amigurumi it only uses one color and you can use any yarn you want i used bernat blanket to make my octopus big soft and cute see 3rd and 4th photo i used 12 mm safety eyes and a 5 5 mm hook for the big octopus if you have any questions don t be afraid to message me also please tag me on instagram @pips_crochet_corner with your finished product i would love to see it
